title: Effective Resumes and Job Applications
creator_credit: Learning Seed, Stage Fright Productions and Louise Welsh Schrank
brief_description: Learn how to handle job applications and resumes so that you don’t make mistakes that could cost you jobs and money. Let this video show you how to handle resumes, cover letters, and job applications. In today’s competitive job market, this video gives straightforward advice you will appreciate.
